keyMoments.title: Reveals Phoenix Pirates Identity
keyMoments.description: Jiro reveals to Chopper that they are the Phoenix Pirates, with Captain Puzzle known for always rising back up like a phoenix.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the true identity and nature of the crew the Straw Hats encountered.
keyMoments.quote: We are, in fact, pirates. The Phoenix Pirates!

keyMoments.title: Tells Story of New World Journey
keyMoments.description: Jiro recounts how the Phoenix Pirates sailed into the New World but were heavily beaten and lost their vice-captain Vigaro.
keyMoments.significance: Provides crucial backstory about the dangers of the New World and the crew's tragic loss.

relationships.description: Jiro is a loyal member of Captain Puzzle's Phoenix Pirates crew.
Jiro opens up to Chopper about the Phoenix Pirates' tragic past while Chopper treats their captain.

reveals.information: The Phoenix Pirates sailed to the New World and lost their vice-captain Vigaro

keyMoments.title: Revealed as Captain of Phoenix Pirates
keyMoments.description: Puzzle is revealed to be the captain of the Phoenix Pirates, known for always rising back up no matter what, earning the crew its phoenix symbolism.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Puzzle's role and reputation as a resilient captain.

keyMoments.title: Loss of Vice-Captain Vigaro
keyMoments.description: It's revealed that Puzzle led his crew to the New World where they lost Vigaro, deeply affecting him and leading to their defeat.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the emotional trauma that has left Puzzle in his current injured and demoralized state.

relationships.description: Vigaro was Puzzle's vice-captain who died protecting the crew in the New World.
Puzzle is the captain of the Phoenix Pirates with Jiro as one of his loyal crew members.

reveals.information: Led his crew to the New World where they were defeated and lost vice-captain Vigaro

keyMoments.title: Activates Trap Kamome
keyMoments.description: Salchow receives Stansen's report and activates the Trap Kamome technique, deploying hundreds of fake Marine ships to ambush the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Accino Family's tactical approach to bounty hunting using deception.

keyMoments.title: Plans to Capture Straw Hats' 600 Million Berry Bounty
keyMoments.description: Salchow and the Accino Family pledge to collect the Straw Hats' combined bounty as a gift for Don Accino.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Accino Family's motivation for targeting the Straw Hats.

abilities.description: Creates hundreds of fake Marine ships using sails on rafts with glowing hologram-like lights to drive pirates into traps.

relationships.description: Salchow is married to Arbell, Don Accino's eldest daughter.
Salchow is Don Accino's son-in-law as husband to Arbell.

reveals.information: Member of the Accino Family bounty hunters
Can deploy Trap Kamome to create fake Marine fleets

keyMoments.title: Death in the New World Revealed
keyMoments.description: Vigaro's death is revealed - he was the vice-captain of the Phoenix Pirates who died protecting his crew during their journey in the New World.
keyMoments.significance: His sacrifice explains the Phoenix Pirates' demoralization and their subsequent defeat by the Accino Family.

relationships.description: Vigaro served as vice-captain under Captain Puzzle until his death in the New World.

reveals.information: Died in the New World protecting the Phoenix Pirates crew

keyMoments.title: First Use of Soldier Dock Channel 0
keyMoments.description: Franky activates the Soldier Dock System's Channel 0, revealing the Cola-Powered Paddle System that allows the Thousand Sunny to move at high speed independent of wind.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of one of the Thousand Sunny's advanced mechanical systems designed by Franky.

abilities.description: Cola-Powered Paddle System that allows the Thousand Sunny to move at high speed using mechanical paddles.

reveals.information: Can activate the Thousand Sunny's Soldier Dock System Channel 0 paddle propulsion

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Stays to Treat Captain Puzzle
keyMoments.description: Chopper remains aboard the Phoenix Pirates' ship to continue treating their injured captain, separating from the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Chopper's dedication as a doctor, putting patient care above his own safety.

keyMoments.title: Learns About Phoenix Pirates
keyMoments.description: Chopper learns from Jiro about the Phoenix Pirates' identity and their tragic history in the New World.
keyMoments.significance: Chopper becomes the first Straw Hat to understand the full story behind the Phoenix Pirates.

relationships.description: Jiro confides in Chopper about the Phoenix Pirates' tragic past while Chopper treats their captain.
